summary: A website named StickSmart for ordering sticks with customer and seller portals, order management, and stock control
architectural_notes: Dual user role system: customers and sellers with separate authentication flows
Order management system with status tracking (pending, completed)
Real-time stock availability indicator affecting customer ordering capability
Price fixed at 14 rupees per stick

existing_features.title: Implement customer authentication system with sign in and sign up functionality using Internet Identity
Implement seller authentication system with email and password sign in and sign up
Create customer order form with dropdown for quantity selection, room number input field, and display price of 14 rupees per piece with total calculation
Create seller dashboard displaying all orders in a list sorted by latest first, showing quantity, room number, and timestamp for each order
Implement stock management system where seller can mark items as out of stock, displaying a red indicator on the customer ordering page and disabling order placement
Add order completion tracking feature allowing sellers to tick off completed orders in the order list

Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, earthy tones (terracotta, amber, sage green) paired with clean typography and a minimal layout that emphasizes functionality and clarity for both customer and seller interfaces
Create backend order management system that stores orders with quantity, room number, timestamp, customer identity, and completion status

new_feature_requests.summary: Seller authentication (sign in/sign up with email and password)
Customer order form with dropdown for quantity and room number input
Display stick price at 14 rupees per piece
Seller dashboard showing orders in list form (latest on top) with room numbers
Seller stock management - mark items as out of stock (red indicator on customer page)
Disable customer ordering when stock is marked as out
Seller order completion tracking - ability to tick off completed orders
